title: Emu
brief_description: ‘Emu’ is a single-take short film depicting the inquisitive desperation of two emus as they wander through the contemporary urban environment of Broken Hill, NSW. Shot during the 2000s Australian drought, the viewer observes the pace of ‘emu time’ while the two animals are searching for water. An original music score accompanies the footage, created and edited by Sean O’Keeffe.
